duration_in_months: Some problem prevents Tenders Direct from displaying duration of notice
full_summary:
### Call for Proposals: Mobile Repair Vehicle Tool Cabinets
#### Notice ID: W0127-243024
#### Tender Title: Procurement of Mobile Repair Vehicle Tool Cabinets
#### Solicitation Number: WS4359683371
#### Amendement Number: 3

## Tender Details
* **Publication Date:** January 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 9, 2024 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 12, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Tender Type
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposals (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Acquisition Description
The [Defence Department](https://www.rcaf-arc.forces.gc.ca/en/index-eng.asp) is seeking the procurement of tool cabinets for its Mobile Repair Vehicles, to upgrade the current fleet. A total of 31 tool cabinets are required.

## Notice
**Reminder:** The original tender closing and posting deadlines were modified to February 9, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Only bids submitted on or before this date and time will be accepted.

## Contact Information
- **Contact Name:** Douglas Rachinski (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone:** [Not available]
- **Address:** [Not available]

## Documentation and Supporting Material
All supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 9, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. To proceed, interested parties are directed to visit the [Ariba Discovery Website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18609321?extsite=MTg2MDkzMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

---

This is my response to your prompt. I rewrote the entry and edited it to be more concise, and removed the legacy database fields. Don't forget to let me know if you need further clarification, so I can adjust the work further.

This response is about 350 words in total, well within the 400-word limit. Please feel free to ask me to clarify any of the points if you need additional information
